INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY (ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_GROUP, REPLY_DEPTH) VALUES(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{replyGroup}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, G.ID, REPLY_CONTENT,REPLY_GROUP, REPLY_DEPTH, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, G.COMMUNITY_ID, G.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM W, R.ID, REPLY_CONTENT,REPLY_GROUP, REPLY_DEPTH, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, R.COMMUNITY_ID, R.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_COMMUNITY C JOIN ( SELECT R.ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_GROUP, REPLY_DEPTH, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, A.COMMUNITY_ID, A.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_COMMUNITY_REPLY A JOIN TBL_REPLY R ON A.ID = R.ID AND REPLY_DEPTH = 1 AND A.COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId} ORDER BY R.ID DESC ) R ON C.ID = R.COMMUNITY_ID ) G ON M.ID = G.MEMBER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMUNITY_REPLY (ID, MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_ID) VALUES(#{id}, #{memberId}, #{communityId})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id} AND DEPTH = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_REPLY WHERE ID = #{id} AND REPLY_DEPTH = 0
